embed.description: League of Legends fanart for another skin idea of mine. Cassiopeia originally uses poison spells, but I think her kit could easily be switched to fire based attacks. Done in Adobe Photoshop 7.0

replies.body: ######I would do sexual things to the person who drew this ~~masturbate~~ masterpiece.

I had a derp moment when I saw your region and read it as "Ewww".

I agree.
i always wondered why masturbate has a u instead of an e, makes no sense lol

So you do not confuse it with master baiting. Let the clip play for about tree fiddy, and you get what I mean ;)
https://youtu.be/5JdK-TD7V-s?t=1m49s
It's truly too bad that Riot refuses to release a new skin for her after more than 3 years.
It's truly heart shattering for me as a Swain main that he hasn't got a skin for 4 years. I play a lot of Cass to so IK what your talking about. It's sad how much Rito favors some champions.
Yet Draven gets 2 within 2 months
